biotools.summary: PIGNON is a protein-protein interaction (PPI)-guided functional enrichment analysis for quantitative proteomics. This algorithm measures the clustering of proteins with a shared Gene Ontology (GO) annotation within the provided PPI network weighted with quantitative proteomics data. The significance of this clustering measure is then estimated from a normal distribution approximated from a Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution. To correct for multiple hypothesis testing, we assess the false discovery rate at various thresholds against a null model.
